body.name: Alpcour Bike Trainer Mat – 36”x78” Multipurpose Carpet and Floor Protection – Water-Resistant with Anti-Slip Texture and Noise Insulation for Home and Indoor Gym Workout Cycling
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs 45 mins
features: ENGINEERED TO LAST – Alpcour Bike Trainer mat is an innovative product aiming to increase the efficiency and safety during workout or training. It is made with 7mm-thick foam-soft odorless PVC with a quality-hardened top layer that is ideal to be stepped-on while wearing cycling shoes with cleats. PVC is also durable and tear-resistant allowing the bike trainer mat to be compatible with various stationary bike brands and other possible equipment.

NON-SLIP MATERIAL – To keep both the mat and equipment in place during your workout activities, Alpcour Bike Trainer Mat was designed with two anti-slip characteristics. First, it is equipped with a textured top layer that keeps the equipment in place during the most intense activities. Secondly, it is also equipped with beveled edges that helps keep the mat in line with the floor. No more worries of moving mat or slipping equipment, you can now fully focus on your workout.

WATER AND SWEAT RESISTANT – Alpcour Bike Trainer mat is fully water-resistant and impervious to sweat and accidentally spilled water. It prevents sweat and water from damaging both the mat and the floor while keeping everything in place. It is also easy to clean and a low maintenance tool.

PERFECT FOR MOST EQUIPMENT – Aside from being a Bike trainer mat, Alpcour bike trainer mat can also be used to protect the floor from treadmills, elliptical, stationary spin bikes and other training equipment. It does not only keep the equipment from moving and damaging the floor but it also helps absorb vibrations caused by the equipment making your indoor training quieter.

COMES WITH A CARRY BAG – Each purchase of Alpcour Bike trainer mat includes a 36”x78” mat and a carry bag. It is perfectly lightweight and portable allowing you to carry it with your other portable training equipment and use whenever and wherever you want. Quality-wise, Alpcour bike trainer mat is manufactured following strict protocols providing you guarantee that every purchase is of the highest quality.

ULTIMATE FAMILY FITNESS GIFT – The ultimate gift for sons, daughters, moms, dads, and grandparents! A Christmas, Father's Day, or Mother's Day gem. Perfect for that special MIL, brother, or any loved one who has it all. It's a unique and practical addition to any home gym setup.

VERSATILE & PROTECTIVE – This anti-slip carpet isn't just for cycling. It’s an ideal present for fitness enthusiasts of all ages, from grandmas to grandkids. Whether it’s a gift for your girlfriend's Xmas, a special surprise for your sister, or a 'thank you' to dad, this mat ensures any fitness equipment remains steady. An impeccable choice for parents, granddaughters, and grandsons striving for a better workout experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The surface is fairly sturdy and overall the is quite tender, so flattens quite quickly after every curling.Makes me want to just lie down and take naps on it. Lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for bikes
reviews.reviewText: Good quality, and size for bikes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean and saves to carpet!
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to clean and maintain! Definitely worth the cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a mat--it just lays there.
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and does its job of providing cushion and catching drops of sweat. Easy to clean.It took a few days to finally flatten out. The outgassing is very strong. I'd suggest keeping it (unrolled) in a well-ventilated area for several days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Bike and accessories are used for training. It meets my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't stay put on the floor.....
reviews.reviewText: ....it moves around - and your trainer/bike goes with it. I recommend using carpet adhesive strips to keep it in place. So far, the strips are working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Arrived timely, feels like a quality mat, too early to speak about durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for protecting hard floors, edges curl a bit
reviews.reviewText: While this mat from Alpcour is advertised as a bike trainer mat, many of its properties -- water resistance, noise reducing, and non-slip -- make it also well-suited to entrance ways and foyers. I am actually using this as a mat to park my bike (that I take outside) on, to help protect the floor from dirt and water. This is wide and long enough for my bike, and it does indeed seem to be water resistant. It has some give to it -- my bike will leave indentations in the material, though it does seem to bounce back after a bit.My main complaint is that the edges are still a bit curled from unpacking, even after 5 days. Hopefully it will flatten out after a few more days. This also had a slight rubbery odor to it after initially unpacking it, though that went away after about a day.The mat fulfills its description at a reasonable price, so I'm giving it 5 stars for now.
